name: galt-contracts
description: Open-source software for land tokenization (accounting on blockchain) and self-governance

scripts.deploy-ganache: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --network ganache && ./node_modules/.bin/surge ./deployed $DOMAIN && echo "CONTRACTS_CONFIG_URL=$DOMAIN\ganache.json"
scripts.deploy-testnet56: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --network testnet56 && ./node_modules/.bin/surge ./deployed $DOMAIN && echo "CONTRACTS_CONFIG_URL=$DOMAIN\testnet56.json"
scripts.deploy-testnet57: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --network testnet57 && ./node_modules/.bin/surge ./deployed $DOMAIN && echo "CONTRACTS_CONFIG_URL=$DOMAIN\testnet57.json"
scripts.deploy-local: rm -rf build && truffle migrate --network local && ./node_modules/.bin/surge ./deployed $DOMAIN && echo "CONTRACTS_CONFIG_URL=$DOMAIN\local.json"
